reviews.review_msg: (BUS 207) Solid choice. Only midterms and one final for this class. Explains concepts well in detail and goes over practice problems in lecture. Pre recorded videos posted on canvas and optional lecture that is recorded where he goes over notes, questions, and problems in detail.

Business is a very practical discipline so Colin lacks the industry experience that profs who had them would be able to share. I found this course material (not the prof!) to be pretty useless. It's a required course, but I honestly can't say I've learned very much. But on the other hand he does make lectures interesting and uses lots of multimedia
He is smart, nice, and hot! Totally doesn't fit into the triangle theory in the text book (p.277)!
He was a really good instructor! All the criterias for the assignments were clear so it was not difficult to do well in the assignments! The exams were also very fair!
